001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.slf4j;
002
003import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
004import org.slf4j.ILoggerFactory;
005import org.slf4j.IMarkerFactory;
006import org.slf4j.helpers.BasicMarkerFactory;
007import org.slf4j.spi.MDCAdapter;
008import org.slf4j.spi.SLF4JServiceProvider;
009
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.RainbowGum;
011import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
012
013/**
014 * SLF4J provider using RainbowGum.
015 */
016@ServiceProvider(SLF4JServiceProvider.class)
017public class RainbowGumSLF4JServiceProvider implements SLF4JServiceProvider {
018
019        /**
020         * Declare the version of the SLF4J API this implementation is compiled against. The
021         * value of this field is modified with each major release.
022         */
023        private static final String REQUESTED_API_VERSION = "2.0";
024
025        @Nullable
026        private ILoggerFactory loggerFactory;
027
028        @Nullable
029        private IMarkerFactory markerFactory;
030
031        @Nullable
032        private MDCAdapter mdcAdapter;
033
034        /**
035         * No Arg for service laoder.
036         */
037        public RainbowGumSLF4JServiceProvider() {
038        }
039
040        @Override
041        public ILoggerFactory getLoggerFactory() {
042                return require(loggerFactory);
043        }
044
045        @Override
046        public IMarkerFactory getMarkerFactory() {
047                return require(markerFactory);
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public MDCAdapter getMDCAdapter() {
052                return require(mdcAdapter);
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        public String getRequestedApiVersion() {
057                return REQUESTED_API_VERSION;
058        }
059
060        private static <T> T require(@Nullable T factory) {
061                if (factory == null) {
062                        throw new IllegalStateException("slf4j was not initialized correctly");
063                }
064                return factory;
065        }
066
067        @Override
068        public void initialize() {
069                /*
070                 * Make JBoss logging use us
071                 */
072                if (System.getProperty("org.jboss.logging.provider") == null) {
073                        System.setProperty("org.jboss.logging.provider", "slf4j");
074                }
075                RainbowGum rainbowGum = RainbowGum.of();
076                initialize(rainbowGum);
077                System.setProperty("SLF4J_LOGGING_LOADED", "true");
078        }
079
080        /**
081         * For testing Rainbow Gums SLF4J without initializing SLF4J.
082         * @param rainbowGum which gum to use for logger factory.
083         */
084        public void initialize(RainbowGum rainbowGum) {
085                var mdc = new RainbowGumMDCAdapter();
086                loggerFactory = new RainbowGumLoggerFactory(rainbowGum, mdc);
087                markerFactory = new BasicMarkerFactory();
088                mdcAdapter = mdc;
089        }
090
091}
